trans-unit.source: Provides the features required to support both complex and simple scenarios when binding to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Fornece as funcionalidades necessárias para suportar cenários complexos e simples quando se vincula a uma origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta interface é implementada pela <xref:System.Data.DataView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Implementation of a method should exhibit the same behavior as the implementation of that method in the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementação de um método deve apresentem um o mesmo comportamento de implementação desse método de <xref:System.Data.DataView>classe.</xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> methods, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A>métodos, deve aumentar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A> method, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration carrying the appropriate index.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>método, deve aumentar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração as devidas o índice adequado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: The added row is in a state where pressing the ESC on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control can remove the new row.
trans-unit.target: A linha adicionada está num Estado em que premir o ESC <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo pode remover a nova linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Raising the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a row not in the "new" state.
trans-unit.target: Gerar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração uma segunda vez esta linha indica que o item é agora uma linha não no estado "novo".</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you remove an item or call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A> method on a new row (if that row implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>), you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration carrying the appropriate index.
trans-unit.target: Ao remover um item ou a chamada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A>método de uma linha nova (se linha que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>), deve aumentar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração as devidas o índice adequado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The list must support this method.
trans-unit.target: A lista tem de suportar este método.

trans-unit.source: However, support for this method can be a nonoperation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, suporte para este método pode ser um nonoperation.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to add to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para adicionar os índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the list.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo item à lista.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A> is `true`; otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é suportado se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>é `true`; caso contrário, um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>é emitida.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Implementing this method means that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> list must understand the type of objects to add to the list and must understand how to create a new instance of that type.
trans-unit.target: Implementar este método significa que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>lista tem de compreender o tipo de objetos a adicionar à lista e tem de compreender como criar uma nova instância desse tipo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a collection of `myCustomer` objects, the AddNew method should add a new `myCustomer` object to the list.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver uma coleção de `myCustomer` objetos, o método AddNew deve adicionar uma nova `myCustomer` objeto à lista.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the objects in this list implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A> method should discard an object, not add it to the list, when the object was created using the AddNew method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se os objetos nesta lista implementam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface, ao chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A>método deve eliminar um objeto, adicione à lista, quando o objeto foi criado utilizando o método AddNew.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: The object should only be added to the list when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O objecto só deve ser adicionado à lista quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método é chamado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must sychronize the object and the list carefully.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, tem de sychronize o objeto e a lista atentamente.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration carrying the appropriate index.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é denominado, deve aumentar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração as devidas o índice adequado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The added row is in a state where hitting Esc on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control can remove the new row.
trans-unit.target: A linha adicionada está num Estado em que atingir Esc <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo pode remover a nova linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Raising the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a normal row (not in new state).
trans-unit.target: Gerar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração uma segunda vez esta linha indica que o item é agora uma linha normal (não está num estado novo).</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The item added to the list.
trans-unit.target: O item adicionado à lista.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether you can update items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se pode atualizar itens na lista.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you can update the items in the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se pode atualizar os itens na lista; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether you can add items to the list using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se pode adicionar itens à lista utilizando <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `true`, esta propriedade devolve `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you can add items to the list using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se pode adicionar itens à lista, utilizando <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether you can remove items from the list, using <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove*> or <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se pode remover itens da lista, utilizando <> </> *> ou <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `true`, esta propriedade devolve `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If AllowRemove returns `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AllowRemove se devolve `false` <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>acionar <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you can remove items from the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se remover os itens na lista; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the list based on a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ordena a lista com base num <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If items are added or removed, these items are placed in the order of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Se os itens são adicionados ou removidos, estes itens são colocados por ordem da ordenação.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é suportado se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>é `true`; caso contrário, este método emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to sort by.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para ordenar por.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the row that has the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice da linha que tenha o determinado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method will select the first row where the value of the `property` parameter equals the value of the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método selecionará a primeira linha em que o valor da `property` parâmetro igual ao valor da `key` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching%2A> is `true`, otherwise this method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é suportado se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching%2A>é `true`, caso contrário, este método emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to search on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> procurar.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `property` parameter to search for.
trans-unit.target: O valor da `property` parâmetro para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that has the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que tenha o determinado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the items in the list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se os itens na lista são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é suportada se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>é `true`; caso contrário, esta propriedade emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IsSorted returns `true`, items are added or removed in the order of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Se devolver IsSorted `true`, itens são adicionados ou removidos por ordem da ordenação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*> has been called and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort*> has not been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <> </> *> EnableNotification for chamada e <> </> *> não foi chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as alterações de lista ou um item na lista de alterações.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado apenas se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> de índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The list must support this method.
trans-unit.target: A lista tem de suportar este método.

trans-unit.source: However, support for this method can be a nonoperation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, suporte para este método pode ser um nonoperation.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para remover os índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: Removes any sort applied using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*>.
trans-unit.target: Remove quaisquer ordenação aplicada com <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort*>

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é suportada se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>é `true`; caso contrário, esta propriedade emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you should raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar este método, deve aumentar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>evento com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType>enumeração.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a direção da ordenação.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é suportada se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>é `true`; caso contrário, esta propriedade emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is being used for sorting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que está a ser utilizado para ordenação.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A> is `true`; otherwise, this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é suportada se <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>é `true`; caso contrário, esta propriedade emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is being used for sorting.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que está a ser utilizado para ordenação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> event is raised when the list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"> </xref> evento é desencadeado quando as alterações de lista ou um item na lista de alterações.

trans-unit.source: Objects in the list must notify the list when they change, so the list can raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Objetos na lista tem de notificar a lista quando são alterados, pelo que a lista pode originar uma <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> event is raised when the list changes or when an item changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"> </xref> evento é desencadeado quando a lista de alterações ou quando um item é alterado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the list supports searching using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se a lista suporta a procura utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list supports searching using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*> method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista suporta a procura utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>método; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the list supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se a lista de suporte a ordenação.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, then <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade é `true`, em seguida, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A>são suportadas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list supports sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista de suporte a ordenação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
